attributes.action: ban the use of Digital Rights Management on Digital Media in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Digital Rights Management, or DRMs, are an attack on the freedom of choice of the consumer to make their own decisions. Whilst European Courts have consistently attacked Microsoft on the issue of anti-competitive practices, we believe that all DRMs are an anti-competitive practice, create unwelcome monopolies, and prevent the consumer from making their own choice over how best to handle their digital media in the United Kingdom.
